trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 做為設計工具的基底類別，在視覺化 Web 設計工具中為衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> 抽象類別的控制項提供設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: In the Visual Web Designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Web 設計工具中，當使用者從來源切換到設計檢視中，描述控制項的標記原始碼衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別會剖析，並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別做為衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援，在 Visual Web 設計工具的設計工具的基底類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class properties provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別屬性會提供下列功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>物件，其通常包含物件，衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>繼承樹狀結構的設計工具中的每個層級的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>屬性可存取衍生自控制項的對應屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> indicate the fields of the data source that provide the text and value content of the list items, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>表示欄位的資料來源提供的文字，且分別值的清單項目內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class methods provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別方法會提供下列功能：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法繫結相關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>設計階段資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法會傳回用來呈現關聯的控制項設計階段的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回在設計階段<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>元件從關聯的控制項容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> from the control container, resolved to the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>控制項容器中，從已解析為設計階段<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view and design the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法準備設計工具，以檢視和設計關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>針對關聯的控制項已變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove additional properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法用來移除其他屬性、 加入其他屬性，或遮蔽關聯控制項衍生自屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>。

trans-unit.source: This section provides two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first demonstrates how to derive a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範如何衍生自訂控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The second demonstrates how to associate a derived control with a designer.
trans-unit.target: 第二個示範如何將衍生的控制項與設計工具產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a class named `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立一個名為`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class displays a `SimpleRadioButtonList` control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別顯示`SimpleRadioButtonList`設計介面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example derives the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control, and shows how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> class to associate the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control with its designer, the `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例衍生`SimpleRadioButtonList`控制項從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項，並示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>類別相關聯`SimpleRadioButtonList`具有它的設計工具控制項`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別時，它會建立關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>設計介面上的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得設計工具的設計工具動作清單集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 與設計工具相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The associated control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" />, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> 的關聯控制項，或是該控制項的複本。

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: 繫結指定的控制項至設計階段資料來源。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> base class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> object to reference the design-time data source, then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and then restores the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties to their original values.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner>基底類別，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>物件參考的設計階段資料來源，然後呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，然後還原<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性為其原始值。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class, however, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method has no functionality, because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> objects were just added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別，不過，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法會有任何功能，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>物件只加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的資料文字欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField" /> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: 清單控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> property sets or retrieves the markup to use for the design-time representation of the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>屬性可設定或擷取用於在執行階段控制項的設計階段表示標記。

trans-unit.source: This provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> property of the associated control, which corresponds to the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: 這會提供透過設計工具，以存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>關聯的控制項，對應於提供清單項目的文字內容的資料來源欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的資料值欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField" /> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: 清單控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> property provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> property of the associated control, which indicates the field of the data source that provides the value content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>屬性可提供透過設計工具，以存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>表示的資料來源提供值內容的清單項目欄位相關聯控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得在設計階段用來表示控制項的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the markup used to render the control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含在設計階段用來呈現衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> 之控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: If the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object is data-bound, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 如果相關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>物件是資料繫結，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法清除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合，並將<xref:System.String>訊息，表示控制項繫結的資料。

trans-unit.source: If the associated control is not data-bound and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is unbound.
trans-unit.target: 如果相關聯的控制項不是資料繫結和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合是空的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>新增<xref:System.String>訊息，表示未繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> calls its base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: 然後，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>呼叫其基底方法，以產生標記。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to customize the markup that is displayed for the associated control on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法來自訂顯示在設計介面上的相關聯控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> property is not defined for the associated control, it is set to `Gainsboro`, and the control is displayed with that background color.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>屬性未定義相關聯的控制項，它會設定為`Gainsboro`，並顯示控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: After this is done, the base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 這麼做的基底實作之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: 從關聯的控制項容器取得資料來源元件，解析成特定資料成員。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" />, resolved to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember" /> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 包含設計階段 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" />，解析成關聯控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>找不到屬性，或如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>不具有相同的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> cannot be resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>無法解析為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>屬性相關聯的控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>包含設計階段介面<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: 從關聯的控制項容器取得資料來源元件。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface and containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" /> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 介面的物件，其中包含關聯控制項的設計階段 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>找不到屬性，或如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>不具有相同的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> that implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> 的控制項，可實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具主應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法時，就可以使用設計工具來呈現控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>以及其基底方法設定屬性，並連接至所需的設計工具的作業事件。

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, that is associated with this designer or is a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: `component`參數是衍生自控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>，是與這個設計工具相關聯或該控制項的複本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method in a designer derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class to ensure that only instances of a control class named `SimpleRadioButtonList` are used by the custom designer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法，在設計工具中衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別，以確保只有控制項類別的執行個體名稱`SimpleRadioButtonList`所使用的自訂設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 當關聯控制項的資料來源已經變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 當關聯控制項的資料來源已經變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>目前的資料來源的物件，如果控制項已連線到資料來源不同，更新的設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法後連接到目前的資料來源的更新設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method in a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>繼承自一個類別中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當資料來源也就是相關聯的設計工具類別，變更，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>呼叫方法時，此程式碼會設定名為的變數`changedDataSource`至`true`。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the design-time markup is to be unconditionally updated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，指出設計階段標記是否無條件地加以更新。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 當關聯控制項的資料來源已經變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別目前的資料來源，而且，如果控制項已連線到資料來源不同，更新的設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method of the designer unconditionally updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>後連接到目前的資料來源設計工具的方法無條件地將更新過的設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: The value of `forceUpdateView` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 值`forceUpdateView`會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method in a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>繼承自一個類別中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當資料來源也就是相關聯的設計工具類別，變更，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>呼叫此程式碼會設定名為的變數和`changedDataSource`至`true`。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: Callers should use the public <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged" /> override.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端應該使用公用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged" />覆寫。

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 集合，實作加入的或遮蔽的屬性之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，以便在設計階段為關聯的控制項公開。

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除其他屬性或加入屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 控制項設計工具使用的方法，以衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来遮蔽各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並將屬性加入到或從其中移除屬性**屬性**方格。

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> attribute to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>新增<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>相關聯控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" />方法，以將屬性加入到或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示關聯的控制項是否應該呈現其預設動作清單。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A> property returns `false` so that a data source dropdown is not displayed with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A>屬性會傳回`false`，讓資料來源下拉式清單中不會顯示與**選擇資料來源**中的功能表項目**一般工作**操作功能表。

trans-unit.source: Instead, this menu item displays the **Choose Data Source** dialog box, which allows the user to select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，此功能表項目會顯示**選擇資料來源**對話方塊，讓使用者選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" /> property to return <see langword="true" /> if you want the control that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> class to display a data source dropdown with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" />屬性，以傳回<see langword="true" />如果您要衍生自控制項<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" />類別來顯示資料來源下拉式清單與**選擇資料來源**中的功能表項目**一般工作**在設計階段的內容功能表。
